title.rendered: Motorcycle Jacket Men’s Riding HWK Textile Racing Motorbike Hi-Vis Biker CE Armored Waterproof Jackets

content.rendered:
• 100% Waterproof Motorcycle Jacket for men, Breathable with the help of lined REISSA MEMBRANE. #HWK to be a part of our growing community of moto enthusiasts 🙂
  • 100% Waterproof Motorcycle Jacket for men, Breathable with the help of lined REISSA MEMBRANE. #HWK to be a part of our growing community of moto enthusiasts 🙂
  • CE APPROVED ARMORS (REMOVABLE) on the Motorcycle Jacket’s Back, Elbows & Shoulders. 2-Color Contrast HWK Design.
  • EXTREMELY VISIBLE REFLECTIVE HWK LOGOS. ALL WEATHER motorcycle jackets mens, 600D CORDURA CONSTRUCTION Textile Motorcycle Racing Jacket , The HWK Motorcycle Jacket is an all season motorbike riding jacket at its best: rugged and strong, yet soft and comfortable to keep you warm during winter, cool during summer and safe all the time.
  • MAXIMUM QUALITY at a MINIMUM PRICE: This a bargain, we bet that you will not find a Textile Motorcycle Jacket for men at this price in the protective gear market. This Waterproof Motorbike Jacket is BREATHABLE & has MICRO-MESH LINING UNDERNEATH
